FuncDef:
The destination-group command associates a destination group to which the data sampled is sent.
The undo destination-group command deletes a destination group that is associated.
By default, no destination group is associated.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a destination group to which the data sampled is sent.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters. The value is the name of an existing Destination-group.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable a destination group that is created in the Telemetry view to take effect, run the destination-group command in the Subscription view to associate it.
Precautions
A maximum of five destination groups can be associated with each subscription using this command. Five IP addresses and five port numbers can be configured for each destination group.
The destination group that is associated in the Subscription view must be created in the Telemetry view first. Otherwise, association fails.
